name: @vertexvis/vertex-api-client
description: The Vertex platform API client for TypeScript and JavaScript.
author: Vertex Developers <support@vertexvis.com> (https://developer.vertexvis.com)

scripts.clean-build: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.generate: npm run clean && openapi-generator generate --input-spec ../../vertex-api/src/main/resources/api-resolved.yml -g typescript-axios -c config.yml && npm run format && cp ../../vertex-api/src/main/resources/api-resolved.yml ./client/spec.yml && npm run verify
